attributes.action: Shut down the petition that stops donald trump from visiting the united kingdom!
attributes.background: We need donald trumps backing to help with brexit as we wanted sovereignty back so we can control our own borders to set a limit on refugees. 52% of the country voted for this now they are trying to take away our choice.

rejection.details:
We can only remove petitions that don't comply with the petitions standards.

You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules for petitions. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
